cyclone.name: ZETA
cyclone.current_location: about 355 mi SSW of New Orleans, Louisiana
cyclone.trajectory: Moving north, then turning north-northeast toward the northern Gulf Coast with landfall expected in southeastern Louisiana before racing inland across the southeastern United States.

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical Storm Watch west of Morgan City to Intracoastal City, LA (well east of Texas coast)
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning Morgan City, LA to the MS/AL border (includes New Orleans); Tropical Storm Warning MS/AL border to Walton/Bay County Line, FL
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Northern Gulf Coast from southeastern Louisiana eastward to the western Florida Panhandle
weather_observation.wind: Only a slight (≤6%) chance of tropical-storm-force gusts; mainly breezy conditions expected.
weather_observation.storm_surge: No significant storm-surge threat for the upper Texas coast.
weather_observation.rainfall: Isolated light rain bands possible; heavy rainfall not expected.
